activity.text:
## Proposed Changes
 add responsive shadcn breadcrumbs

- Fixes #8831 

Current version
![Screenshot 2024-10-27 055208](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/04d123f1-5b20-4037-a36a-2d97f47b040c)

Last item broken

![Screenshot 2024-10-27 055401](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24d42762-966d-4995-89ff-241ff850f464)

No dropdown here

Updated version

![Screenshot 2024-10-27 055745](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bd7fd764-3b87-4d0e-8b09-86007d10c358)
Last item broken issue solved

![Screenshot 2024-10-27 055906](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a68e54a6-ee9b-465d-91f0-686a3c9daaa1)
Shadcn Dropdown added

@ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers

## Merge Checklist

- [ ] Add specs that demonstrate bug / test a new feature.
- [ ] Update [product documentation](https://docs.ohc.network).
- [ ] Ensure that UI text is kept in I18n files.
- [ ] Prep screenshot or demo video for changelog entry, and attach it to issue.
- [ ] Request for Peer Reviews
- [ ] Completion of QA
